body:
Hey guys!
Thought I'd promote my most recent video here, of me playing some Nexus.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wuRAB0HTOJ0
You really don't have to watch the whole thing.... 21 minutes messes up people's attention spans lol.
Thanks for taking the time to watch!

title: First Avicore Nexus Video

replies.body: Ohmygosh, I love the video so much! Your commentary is amazing, as well as your PVP :D  If you'd like, I'd be happy to make a video with you if you ask a little in advance! Just know that I'm really talkative and not good at PVP xD

replies.body:
Hey Cinammoncroc! :D
Nice Video :$!
If you mind can you please give me your resource pack. I'm currently customizing one, and it's turning out great!
Hopefully, it'll turn out even better when you send me your resource pack xD
Anyways, Nice Video! :D

replies.body:
Wow, I wasn't so expecting so many replies xD
@TheRomanTrident Thanks! That hacker was banned once before this video as well, I believe.

@goldenwalrus909 Thanks! I'll definitely consider recording a video with you ;) and my PVP isn't that great, I just get lucky :P

@zeus449 Thank you very much :) I'll add you on skype and send you my resource pack (modified version of #FaithfullSweg) but not now since it's quite late and I should be getting some rest.

Thank you all for watching!
replies.body_tagged:
